fields.title: Robot Vacuum &  Mop Bundle
fields.description: Takes care of the cleaning from start to finish - emptying on its own into a disposable bag that holds 30 bins of dirt, dust, and hair, so you don’t have to think about vacuuming for weeks at a time. The enclosed bag traps dust, so it can’t escape into the air. PerfectEdge™ Technology finds dirt where it hides using Maximized-Edge Design and a specially angled corner brush to reach deep into corners. Advanced sensors constantly scan ahead of the robot, helping it to get close to walls and deep into corners.

fields.title: Ride-on Lawn Mower
fields.description: The John Deere X127 stands for dependability, durability and power in eevry aspect of its design, including a fully welded steel frame and a cast-iron front axle. An ergonomic operator station, a powerful engine with an infinite choice of ground speeds, and high quality headlights make the 127 lawn tractor a breeze to operate and a joy to own.

fields.title: Kitesurf Kite
fields.description: The Nexus 2, is technically billed as two kites in one, but we found at least three things it’s really good at. Just set the kite’s CIT Modes to match the beach conditions and go have fun. Be it hard cutbacks on your favourite wave or a sublime backroll, the Nexus 2 will excite your senses.

fields.title: Evo Elite 4.1 RGB Gaming Chair
fields.description: It’s a super-padded pedestal chair that’s designed just for gaming! It has built-in 4.1 sound, tri-motor vibration feedback, and it lights up with more colours than a ‘60s album cover!

fields.title: Bean-to-Cup Espresso Machine
fields.description: Bean-to-cup coffee machine – beautifully designed (as you’d expect, it is made by De’Longhi), with bean hopper; built-in grinder; progress, pressure and menu displays; Sensor Grinding Technology; Smart Tamping Station; dynamic pre-infusion; active temperature control and LatteCrema system.

fields.title: Dyson Hair Wrap and Supersonic drier
fields.description: Dyson Air wrap complete fuchsia pink set hair styler style your hair with the all-new Dyson Air wrap complete hair styler that comes with capabilities never experienced before. The clockwise and anti-clockwise barrels provides you with symmetrical curls so you can choose which style fits your profile. It enables you to create and set voluminous curls or waves so that you look stunning during any party or any occasion. Exceptional performance The Dyson air wrap complete hair styler provides you with some remarkable performance that will style up your hairs in no time.
